overview: Having grown in foster care, Alison is just looking for be part of a family. So, when Chanel and Michael hire her as their full-time babysitter she finally finds the stability she's long for. But Alison's growing attraction to Michael becomes even more dangerous when Chanel confides in her that her husband's been plotting to kill her.
tagline: How Far Will You Go To Please Your Employer?
title: The Babysitter 11
